text: 1972 - Swi. 1 The federal Act of 30 June 1972 made extensive amendments, inter alia, to the Old Age and Survivors' Insurance Act of 20 Dec. 1946 (LS 1946 - Switz. 1 ... 1961 - Swi. 1) and the Disability Insurance Act of 19 June 1959 (LS 1959 - Swi. 1, 1967 - Swi. 1); instead of translating the Act of 30 June 1972 as it stood, the ILO took this opportunity of publishing consolidated versions of the two Acts mentioned above as 1972 - Swi. 1 A and B respectively. The consolidated versions are those in force on 1 Jan. 1973. III. ERRATA Legislative Series. 1972

text: 30 Dec. Order Ho. 24 of the Officers of the Council of Ministers, to amend and supplement the Regulations [of 15 Jan. 1958] to apply the Pensions Act [IS 1957 - Bui. l] [amends ss. 37, 38, 40 and 92]. ("D'rzhaven Vestnik", 4 Feb.) An Act to amend and supplement the Act [of 1951] respecting copyright. (Ibid., 5 May) Amendments and additions to Instruction Ho. 2082 [of 1968], respecting the stoppage and transfer of sums deducted from pensions that employed pensioners are not entitled to receive. (Ibid., 16 June) Directives for the placement of handicapped persons in disability group III in normal conditions of employment in undertakings, institutions and organis tions. (Ibid., 25 Aug.) Order No. 377 of the Officers of the Council of Ministers, to amend and supplement the Regulations [of 5 June 1969] made under the Act respecting inven tions and rationalisation schemes and certain other legislative texts [numerous amendments], (Ibid., 10 Hov.) Order Ho. 385 of the Officers of the Council of. Ministers, to approve a number of legislative texts making systematic provision for the introduction of the economic system into agriculture [approves, and reproduces in annex, a number of Temporary Ordinance including a Temporary Ordinance respecting the organisation of remuneration for work in agricultura organisations and a Temporary Ordinance respecting t funds established by agricultural organisations]. (Ibid., 17 Hov.) Standards respecting radiation hazards. 1 Dec.) (Ibid., Resolution Ho. 41, to amend and supplement certain legislative texts in connection with the application of the economic system over the period 1971-75 [approves amendments and additions to a number of texts, which are reproduced in annex, including the Regulations respecting state economic organisations, the Ordinance respecting planning, the Regulations respecting the organisation of wages, and the Ordinance respecting the funds established by state economic organisations]. (Ibid., 12 and 16 Jan. 19 errata: ibid., 20 Feb. 1973)

text: 23 Deo. Decree No. 1600, to establish and regulate a special social security scheme for "bullfighters [defines the concept of occupational accidents, etc.]. (Ibid., 26 June) Order to approve employment regulations for theatrical, circus, variety and folk-lore performances. (Ibid., 14 Aug.; errata: ibid., 20 Sep.) Order to regulate the permanent education of adults at a level equal to the first grade of vocational train- ing. (Ibid., 14 Aug.) Order to approve employment regulations for work in offices [repeals the Regulations of 21 Apr. 1948 respecting work in offices]. (Ibid., 14 Nov.; errata: ibid., 14 Dec.) Decree No. 3090. respecting employment policy. (Ibid., 15 Nov.) Sp. 1 Order to regulate the internal migratory movements of workers and their families and to lay down principles for their supervision and assistance. (Ibid., 2 Feb. 1973) Order to make provision for general or specific pre- training courses and for the supplementary cost of vocational training courses for workers covered by the unemployment scheme. (Ibid.; errata: ibid., 28 Feb. 1973) Order respecting vocational training programmes covered by the Decree respecting employment policy [LS 1972 - Sp. l]. (Ibid., 2 Feb. 1973; errata: ibid., 2 Apr. 1973) Order to lay down the procedure for dealing with files relating to the termination, suspension or alteration of relationships governed by labour law. (Ibid., 2 Feb. 1973) Decree No. 3772, to approve general regulations under [the consolidated text of the laws governing] the special social security scheme for agricultural workers [IS 1971 - Sp. 6] [repeals the general regulations under Act No. 38 of 31 May 1966 to institute a special social security scheme for agricultural workers, as approved by Decree No. 3O9 of 23 Feb. 1967; schedules contain a table of occupational diseases and a list of jobs capable of producing them]. (Ibid., 19 Feb. 1973; errata: ibid., 22 Mar. 1973)
